import React, { handleChange, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { InputGroup, Form, Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; const ManufacturerModal = () => { const [modalState, setModalState] = useState("manufacturerModal" | "serviceModal" | "contactModal" | "confirmationModal" | "close") const handleShowManufacturerModal = () => { setModalState("manufacturerModal") } const handleShowServiceModal = () => { setModalState("serviceModal") } const handleShowContactModal = () => { setModalState("contactModal") } const handleShowConfirmationModal = () => { setModalState("confirmationModal") } const handleClose = () => { setModalState("close") } return ( <> Konfigurator servisa

 ); } export default ManufacturerModal;
